title: Want to make UPI and RuPay truly global: RBI governor Shaktikanta Das
description: RBI governor Shaktikanta Das announced plans to make UPI and RuPay global to improve cross-border payment systems. The central bank aims to create UPI-like infrastructure overseas and link UPI with other countries' fast payment systems.
